title: Savage Lover
description: Two people who believe they’re unworthy of love… until they meet each other.Camille Rivera is drowning. Her father’s sick, her brother’s in deep with a dirty cop, and her mechanic shop is failing.Nero Gallo is the neighborhood psychopath. As vicious as he is gorgeous, Camille has watched him burn through every girl in a ten-mile radius, breaking hearts and never, ever getting attached.Which is why she can’t believe it when Nero saves her from a seriously sticky situation. They’ve lived next to each other all their lives — is it possible she never really knew him at all?Camille is about to learn that the only thing more dangerous than trusting Nero is falling for him.
author: Sophie Lark
